      • open

        public void open()
        Uses the application request token to generate a URL opened by the browser in which the users can get their pin.

      • getRequestToken

        public twitter4j.auth.RequestToken getRequestToken()
        Returns the request token.
        Returns:
        requestToken

      • setRequestToken

        public void setRequestToken(twitter4j.auth.RequestToken requestToken)
        Sets the request token.
        Parameters:
        requestToken - request token

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String pin)
        Uses the specified pin to generate an access token used to authenticate every twitter function and sets the login state to true. If the pin is incorrect it displays a dialog.
        Parameters:
        pin - the code given by Twitter to authorize access

      • searchTwitter

        public void searchTwitter(java.lang.String info,
                          java.lang.String period)
        Accesses a specific Twitter page, gets its tweets and saves each one on a list. Organizes the list from the most recent tweets to the oldest. Chooses which tweets are displayed depending on the JComboBox chosen item.
        Parameters:
        info - The keywords used on the JTextField
        period - The time period chosen on the JComboBox

      • retweet

        public void retweet(long tweetId)
        Retweets the specified Status in its parameter.
        Parameters:
        tweetId - number of the tweet to retweet

      • favorite

        public void favorite(long tweetId)
        Favorites the specified Status in its parameter.
        Parameters:
        tweetId - number of the tweet to favorite

      • reply

        public void reply(long tweetId,
                  java.lang.String reply)
        Replies to the specified Status in its first parameter with the text specified as second parameter.
        Parameters:
        tweetId - number of the tweet to reply
        reply - actual text to create a reply

      • checkConnection

        Checks if there is internet connection using google.com
